title: Advanced Algebra Learning Course Based on Real-World Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic algebra (equations, functions, graph comprehension) and high school-level mathematics fundamentals
context.additional_context: Optimizes smartphone-based learning environments, concretizing abstract concepts through real-life problems

learning_goals: The learner can transform linear programming problems into mathematical models in realistic contexts (resource allocation, budget management, etc.)
The learner can systematically apply algebraic solutions to optimize objective functions under constraints
The learner constructs, interprets, and visualizes graphs using smartphone-based digital tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
